# Project Templates Documentation

This directory contains documentation for all the project templates available in the Codeius AI Coding Agent.

## Available Templates

- [React Template](react_template.md) - React project with Create React App setup and modern components
- [Flask Template](flask_template.md) - Flask project with application factory pattern and blueprints
- [Django Template](django_template.md) - Django project with models, views and admin interface
- [FastAPI Template](fastapi_template.md) - FastAPI project with REST API, database integration, and async support
- [Node.js/Express Template](nodejs_express_template.md) - Node.js/Express project with MVC pattern and database integration
- [AI/ML Template](ai_ml_template.md) - AI/ML project with data science tools and experiment tracking
